All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionCard
Class used to model a generic Uno action Card
ActionPerformResult
Describes the possibles results after playing an Card: SUCCESSFUL NO_COLOR_PROVIDED NO_PLAYER_PROVIDED PLAYER_WON
AIPlayer
This class specializes Player to provide the artificial intelligence methods, in particular the method the simulates the human choice factor are : choosing to say Uno (human players can forget so the AI should not be perfect too) choosing to expose someone that forget to say Uno (human players can forget so the AI should not be perfect too) choosing the best card to play choosing the color when performing a Wild In general for each of all the choices a human player performs, there has to be a corresponding AI method.
Animation
Abstract class used to provide the common attributes and methods of the Animations.
AudioManager
Class used to manage all the audio usages, playing and stopping clips, setting volumes.
AudioManager.Effect
KEYS for stats PLAY DRAW_CARD FLIP UNO NOT_VALID ERROR WIN LOSS CLICK AUDIO_TEST REVERSE SKIP DRAW WILD_DRAW GREEN RED YELLOW BLUE
AudioManager.Music
Background music CALM_BACKGROUND
Card
Class used to model a generic Uno card
CardAnimation
Customize the Animation to add the common default width and height of the ViewCard for the CardAnimation
CardFactory
Class used to provide methods to build cards
ChangebleIcon
Class used to store more images in one JLabel.
CircularImage
Class used to crop an Image in a circle.
ClassicRules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of the classic game mode of UNO
Classic deck composition of Uno
108 cards distributed so: 4 Cards Wild 4 Cards Wild Draw Then for each color: 1 Zero Card 2 Cards for each value from 1 to 9 2 Cards draw 2 Cards skip 2 Cards reverse
Color
All the colors of a Uno Card,
colors are thought to be comparable,
and the order goes top-down like this: RED YELLOW GREEN BLUE WILD
Config
This class is a container for static values that represent the configuration of all the application settings.
Config.KEYS
Keys for configs hashmap representation: KEY VALUE EFFECTS_VOLUME "effectsVolume" MUSIC_VOLUME "musicVolume" DECK_STYLE "deckStyle" GRAPHIC_QUALITY "graphicQuality" SAVED_ICON_PATH "savedIconPath" LOGGED_PLAYER "player" CONFIG "config"
Controller<T extends Container>
Class used to model all the controllers that manage an associated view that extends container.
CustomMouseAdapter
Class used to customize the MouseAdapter to provide a default one with the click AudioManager.Effect and hand cursor on hovering
DataAccessManager
This class acts as the data layer of the application,
and provides all the methods to access and store data.
DeckColor
DeckColor VALUE BLACK "black" WHITE "white"
DeckManager
Class used to manage a deck of cards of a Uno Game.
DrawCard
Class used to model a Uno card : Draw
Specialize the generic class Card
FlippingAnimation
Class used to draw the ViewCard flipping when drawn from the user.
GameChoiceController
Specialize Controller on GameChoicePanel.
GameChoiceController.GameMode
The selectable game-modes: CLASSIC_RULES MEME_RULES SEVENO_RULES
GameChoicePanel
Class used to create a menu between the StartingMenuPanel and the GamePanel, where the user can choose the GameChoiceController.GameMode he wants to play.
GamePanel
Class used to display the actual game.
GamePanel.State
State PLAYER_TURN AI_TURN GAME_PAUSED WIN MATCH_WIN
GamePanelController
Specialize Controller on GamePanel.
GifComponent
Class used to normally draw an ImageComponent and a gif when hovered.
GraphicQuality
GraphicQuality VALUE HIGH "High" LOW "Low"
HumanPlayer
This class specializes Player to profile a human player
ImageComponent
Class used to customize a JLabel with an ImageIcon that can be scaled
InputPanel
Class used to provide the common JComponents and method of the profile management InputPanels.
InputPanel.InputMessages
 
JsonFileManager
Class used to read and write on files.
Juno
 
LoginPanel
Class used to provide the InputPanel where the user can log in an already created account.
MainFrame
Creates the custom JFrame of the entire game.
MainFrame.Cards
State MAIN SETTINGS GAME
MainFrameController
Specialize Controller on MainFrame.
MainFrameController.Panels
Panels : STARTMENU SETTINGS GAMECHOICE PROFILE GAME
MemeRules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of a game mode of UNO created by us Uno meme rules are : Setup -the number of cards that can be played in a single turn 3 -the number of cards distributed to each player at the start 11 -the cards with which a deck is composed by classic deck composition with 2 more skip,2 more draw2 ,2 more reverse for each color, 4 more wild and 4 more wild_draw4.
MovingAnimation
Class used to move the ViewCard from one point to another.
Options
Class used to store the parameters needed in a card action performance , in order to perform an ActionCard
Options.OptionsBuilder
Class used to build an Options object
Player
Class used to model a generic Uno player,
provides methods to make basic plays during the game.
PlayerInputTabbedPanels
Custom JTabbedPane that contains all the InputPanel needed for the profile management
PlayerManager
Class used to store and retrieve data in this application model.
PlayerManager.KEYS
KEYS for stats KEY String representation NAME "name" PASSWORD "password" STATS "stats"
ProfilePanel
Class used to create two ResizablePanel used to display infos about the ViewCard.
ProfilePanelController
Specialize Controller on MainFrame.
RegistrationPanel
Class used to provide the InputPanel where the user can create a new account.
ResizablePanel
Class used to provide the default methods and attributes of each Panel of the game.
ReverseCard
Class used to model a Uno card : Reverse
Specialize the generic class Card
RotatingAnimation
Class used to draw an image rotating on its center.
SettingsController
Specialize Controller on SettingsPanel.
SettingsPanel
Class used to create the menu where the user can change the settings of the game and the music.
SevenoRules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of the seven-o game mode of UNO.
SkipAction
Provides the default void performSkipAction, that performs skip action
multiple players can be skipped at the same time too.
SkipCard
Class used to model a Uno card : Skip
Specialize the generic class Card
StartingMenuController
Specialize Controller on StartingMenuPanel.
StartingMenuPanel
Class used to create the first visible ResizablePanel on screen.
Stats
Class used to store the stats of a Player
Stores victories, defeats, and level.
Stats.KEYS
KEYS for stats Key String representation VICTORIES "victories" DEFEATS "defeats" LEVEL "level"
TextAnimation
Class used to draw an image at the center of the screen for 2 seconds.
TurnManager
Class used to manage the flow of turns in a Uno Game match Provides a good help to keep trace of the player that has to play and the last card played
UnoGameRules
This class is used to model the possible rules a Uno game, more specifically the aspects the various game-modes can change.
UnoGameTable
The UnoGameTable represents the table of a Uno game match.
UpdatePanel
Class used to provide the InputPanel where the user can change the name and the password of the account, only after checking the current password.
Utils
Class used to provide common utilities methods for the painting of the images on screen
Value
All the values of Uno Card,
values are associate to their points value
and the scheme is like so: Values Points ZERO to NINE 0-9 SKIP 20 REVERSE 20 DRAW 20 WILD 50 WILD DRAW 50
ViewAnimableCard
Customize the ViewRotatableCard to add a shift Dimension used when drawing.
ViewCard
Class used to provide the Card a graphic representation.
ViewPlayer
Class used to provide the Player a graphic representation, with its profile picture CircularImage and its hand with ViewAnimableCard
ViewRotatableCard
Customize the ViewCard to provide the rotation needed by the ViewCard when displayed on screen.
ViewSlider
Class used to customize a JProgressBar.
WildAction
Provides the default void changeColor, that performs wild action
WildCard
Class used to model a Uno card : Wild
Specialize the generic class Card
